Html:

Hmm.. This is strange. I will make a bug report.
Cause of the bug identified. Fix will be checked into SVN this evening

What does it mean ?
There will have a correction ?

Marc

It means that there is a correction/fix in the latest code. This will be included in the 1.7.1 release.

However, you can download the latest source code from: http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/SourceControl/ListDownloadableCommits.aspx if you want access to the fix now.
